title: Ticket #6012: condor_gpu_discovery -dynamic should be useable by STARTD_CRON
description:
It should be possible to use condor_gpu_discovery directly as the executable for a STARTD_CRON hook. As of 8.6, this is not possible because condor_gpu_discovery will always publish DetectedGPUs, which would be a problematic thing for a STARTD_CRON hook to publish.

So an argument should be added to condor_gpu_discovery, (-cron?) that would tell it to publish dynamic attributes only, then it could be used as the STARTD_CRON executable without any filtering like this. 

    # update GPU temperatures every 5 minutes
    use FEATURE : StartdCronPeriodic(DYNGPUS, 5*60, $(LIBEXEC)/condor_gpu_discovery, -dymamic -cron)
